Articles.Content: The [ and ] keys do nothing in map view that I can see. How about making them flick through a list of first the current body, then all the current orbiting vessels? The alt key can be a modifier to switch between SOIs from Kerbol down to Eeloo, including any moons on the way.

The Tab (and Shift-Tab) keys switch focus between current ship, maneuvers, and celestial bodies.

Be careful about Shift-Tab though, it may make your ship accelerating if you have navball popped out and are at x1 time warp.

Well. That's me told.
Also, backspace returns the focus to the current craft. You can't focus on other crafts, however.
